external_references.description: Microsoft. (2022, May 9). Ransomware as a service: Understanding the cybercrime gig economy and how to protect yourself. Retrieved March 10, 2023.

description: [Cinnamon Tempest](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1021) has used a customized version of the [Impacket](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0357) wmiexec.py module to create renamed output files.(Citation: Microsoft Ransomware as a Service)
